a.n: TECHNO-SCIENCE - TECNOLOGIAS PARA MEJORAR LA AGRICULTURA

p.k: In this chapter we will see how Cristi√°n Campos travels to San Francisco de Mostazal where knows the work being done with drones in the agricultural sector. Specifically visit the company Winter seed that a year working with this technology in their fields. Andrea Obaid meanwhile travels to Arica to see how science is working to keep Chile free of the plague of fruit flies. There visit the production site of sterile insects to develop a process and monitoring of flies on their agricultural land.
